Lo recomiendo al 100%, no llevo mucho tiempo jugandolo pero es un juego que merece la pena jugarlo, conforme avanzas en el juego vas mejorando tu habilidad dentro del mismo, dandote la posibilidad de jugar como asesino o superviviente y a su vez contando con diversa cantidad de personajes.

One of the funnest games I have ever played. It's basically TWO games in one. Play killer or play survivor two crazy different perspectives balled into one video game. Also endless progression system, prestige, dailies the list goes on and on its madness. LOVE the game

The game has its bugs and issues, but I still love it nonetheless. Making an online game and keeping up with the bugs, what the community wants/needs, and whatnot is very hard and I totally get that. It's like art. You don't just press a button and everything is done and ready to be patched in, it takes time and effort.
There are aspects about it I can't control like the occasional toxic/uncouth survivor/killer, but I'm certain the community will grow up and grow past that. 
It's just a game after all. :)
버그만 고쳐지면 참 좋은 게임입니다

This ain't gonna be one of my usual funny reviews. I'm not happy with this game.

Dead By Daylight is a game that is a lot like chess. Everyone's moves are relatively calculated and there is a lot to learn about it. 

This is also its absolutely horrible flaw.

A chessmaster can run circles around a beginner, and the same goes for this game. An expert killer can mop up an opposing team without any trouble and a few expert survivors can juke the killer all day long until the door opens and they all escape.

The matchmaking is abysmal and you'll be a brand new survivor going against a killer thats dropped 1000 hours into the game with predictable results. You'll get absolutely slaughtered without really knowing why and it only serves as an ego salve for the killer. It hardly ever pairs you against someone with the same skill level as you so as a survivor you are most likely going to be playing against career killers with the occasional brand new one blundering in there once in awhile. But don't worry, those brand new killers will disconnect after being frustrated and the game won't count as an escape, meaning you won't actually get your daily objectives to escape as a certain character and the match will be pointless.

You'll have more moderate success AS killer when you play since the survivors sometimes won't always be experts, but you'll pay for that in a wait time that is long enough that I was able to finish season 2 of the umbrella academy in between matches. It happens less as killer but there is often a duo or two of experts playing that will juke you and free all other survivors and get the generators up within a few minutes of the match start, leaving you to fruitlessly chase after the fleeing survivors as they escape.

So is this game worth your time?

No. Don't waste your money. After you buy this game there is more dlcs to unlock special characters. Then there's outfits because the ones you get as default look kind of dumb, so you have to drop more money for that. But oh wait you can get those if you pay for the battle pass which gives you 1/16th of an outfit every time you finish an objective. Thats only 30-50 hours per outfit. No big deal. Everybody has that kind of spare time right?

This game will milk your wallet dry and keep coming back for more with the inclusion of shallow new killers that don't really add much to the game but will become the new meta so you kind of have to use them if you want to win. 

If you do play this game you'll find you will have to sink hours and hours into it to become good. You'll have to research youtube videos, go on reddit and look up strategies, you'll have a lot of homework to do. Personally when a game asks me to do homework, I ask the game why I bothered spending money on it. If I wanted homework I'd go back to college.

In the end its a frustrating and toxic experience where your failures and frustration will be met with mocking and derision by the community at large and this is from someone who is a veteran of Dark Souls "git gud" community.

Stay away from this game if you don't want to spend hours of your life pissed off.

Игра прекрасна!
Есть (+ и -),но не слишком критичные.
+
1.Хорошее разнообразие Маньяков и персонажей.
2.Прокачка дерева умений огромна.
-
1.Глупые люди,которые не могут даже помочь тебе,когда ты лежишь на земле после удара маньяка.
2.Донат! Чтобы поиграть за хороших персонажей,тебе нужно задонатить.
В целом игра достойна своих денег,вселенная Dead by Daylight великолепна.
gay shit hitboxy na píču

Dieses Spiel ist recht gut gemacht :3 ich habe viel spass mit freunden als überlebender und als killer ist man solo gut dabei. Ich verstehe aber nicht warum ihr "camper" flamed, da die devs selber neulich meinten es wäre eine "valid strategy" für killer, keine gute oder spassige, aber eine strategy halt. natürlich ist campen iwie doof, aber wenn der killer meint, inzwischen die generatoren zu vernachlässigen ist das nicht euer problem. 8/10 punkten von mir (ich will noch nen bestimmten  lizensierten killer, aber der kommt wohl nie .-.)

P.S: wer hier schreibt es ist unfair im balancing...cry me a river XD leute nennt mir ein game was PERFEKT gebalancet ist und ich werde meine meinung ändern.
